name: Norduk's RRL (RandomRoguelike)
description:
A Roguelike that started as a quick command prompt, text-based game and later shifted to a Win Forms app.

The spawn of boredom, a run-down laptop that couldn't play a straight game of Minesweeper and some free time, figured I'd try developing a fully-randomized dungeon crawler with a couple of user-set variables to make it interesting and re-playable. Everything is random, including your own personal ASCII adventurer.

A quick and dirty game worth the 48kb on a pen drive for a lazy afternoon, If any further ideas come by I'll be updating it.

Enjoy!
